title: Extended Thinking Keywords
description: Keywords to enable Claude Code's extended thinking feature (by budget tier)

thinkingKeywords.description: Allocates the maximum token budget, triggering the deepest level of extended thinking for highly complex problems. (Claude Code only)
thinkingKeywords.example: Design a scalable microservices architecture for this e-commerce platform, considering all edge cases, security implications, and performance optimizations ultrathink

thinkingKeywords.description: Also allocates the maximum budget, equivalent to 'ultrathink', for comprehensive problem-solving and analysis. (Claude Code only)
thinkingKeywords.example: Debug this complex memory leak in our React application and refactor the entire state management system for better performance think harder

thinkingKeywords.description: Allocates a medium token budget, suitable for tasks that require significant but not exhaustive thought. (Claude Code only)
thinkingKeywords.example: Implement a robust authentication system with JWT tokens, refresh mechanisms, and proper error handling think hard

thinkingKeywords.description: Equivalent to 'think hard', this allocates a medium budget for moderately complex requests. (Claude Code only)
thinkingKeywords.example: Review this API design and suggest improvements for better RESTful practices and data validation think deeply

thinkingKeywords.description: Allocates the minimum extended thinking budget, providing a small boost for straightforward problems. (Claude Code only)
thinkingKeywords.example: Explain how this sorting algorithm works and fix the edge case bug think
